domain.name: Brand Vertical

text: @TMobile @Tesla GM, I’d continue sharing love and delivering food to others effected by the Coronavirus . I’d use it to extend services & food through organizations that I serve through now.  Serving others is essential as I give back w/strength after a kidney transplant.
